license.comments:

evaluateBeanshell.message: Maven module has to be in a "groupId" beginning with "org.neo4j"

requireFilesDontExist.message: You are not allowed to have classes in "com" package

RestrictImports.reason: Star imports are not allowed, please configure your editor to substitute them with fully qualified imports.

bannedDependencies.message: Depending on test jars in compile scope is banned
